ReviewText: I found out later when I checked my order receipt that the route package protection service was added to my order. I also noticed that the route package protection is added in a deceptive manner by default. No one includes a default addition to something that they order & they will add additional items if they want. This deceptive practice is pretty shady & not reputable!

ReviewText: I ordered 20 items and only received 19, I contacted customer service and told them about the missing item. She was the worst customer service ever. She refused to ship the missing item, she refused to give me refund or store credit for future purchases. I don't think you will have any repeat customers with that customer service.

Name: annoyed buyer
ReviewText: they shipped only 3 of 4 items, didn't give me any update. after 10 days i had to inquire and then they "updated" my order canceling that item.on top of it, i paid shipping fees thinking i was buying 4 items; if i pay shipping to buy three items, then there is no value for me and i wouldn't have made the purchase. this is unethical business practice.so be warned, you may think you are getting value but they could choose to cancel all your items except the cheapest one on your list and then charge you shipping fees on it.

Name: Anand Kambli
ReviewText: Hello.My order USPA37858 was delivered to a wrong address and I got a message saying your order has been delivered when I did not receive anything. The delivery was by DHL. They sent a picture as well of the parcel at a house but it was not our house. I called DHL customer service and they are looking to fix the issue and asked me to contact US Polo as well for the issue. It has been an week chasing DHL and I just received an email from DHL (Shipment number: 60120161800530) which stated the following."I am writing to you regarding a complaint raised in relation to your missing parcel.I do apologise to hear that the driver has not taken the due care upon your delivery and delivered your item to the incorrect address.We have been chasing the depot to send the driver back to rectify this error.However, the depot has informed us this morning that the driver has been unsuccessful in getting this parcel back and has advised that the best route would be for you to contact your sender to seek a possible replacement or refund."I mailed customerservice for US Polo with all the details few days ago but have received no response.

ReviewText: I recently purchased this jacket and have been thoroughly impressed with its performance. The thick material not only offers excellent insulation but also provides a robust shield against the elements. Its waterproof feature has proven invaluable during unexpected rain showers, keeping me dry and comfortable. Additionally, the windproof design ensures that gusty winds are no match for this jacket. The fit is true to size, offering both comfort and style. Overall, it's a reliable and stylish choice for anyone looking to stay warm and protected in challenging weather conditions. Highly recommended!

Name: Emily
ReviewText: My husband has been looking for soft, easy to care for V Neck Sweaters. They are nice for layering or out to dinner. These fit the bill. They are machine- washable (just turn them inside out), maintain shape and don't pill. We got him large in every color.  They feel soft like cashmere but synthetic and not scratchy like wool. Great deal at $19.99 each. Easy return for one we bought for our 40 year old son in Medium.  Both needed size large.

ReviewText: I finally received my order on the 30th, with no email or any notification. Called the customer service number several times, could not get anyone because they said the lines were busy. It was what I ordered. I'm glad it wasn't a scam. They need to work on their customer service.

Name: Che La
ReviewText: US polo has worst return policy of all company on the earth. If you buy online you cannot return to store. The only way to return is by using pre-paid label. They not only deduct shipping charges you paid in original order ( which is normal) but also charge you $7.50 for return label from the refund amount. How can you penalize customer for an item not fitting? And it is not like I am returning all the items. I am trying to return 1 of the 7 item, that means clearly there is an issue with 1 item and you are already getting business from customer. In a world where all retailers are aiming for easy returns and retaining customers, uspa assn is doing exact opposite.They have worst customer service. Their customer care phone number goes to voicemail after one ring. Even if you drop a voicemail they never call you back( because they don’t care). I sent an email and they responded in 5 days. When I was not satisfied with the response, I asked if there is a way to talk to or email a supervisor regarding this, I got a response “I am the only manager in customer service department” . What company on earth have a single customer care representative without any accountability and escalation path. I would not recommend anybody buy from uspa assn. it’s better to go with other brand who not only have equal or better quality, but good returns policy and customer service. I have seen most of the retailers customer service going above and beyond to help customer, not to make life difficult for them like this.

ReviewText: I am really struggling to find a complaint dept. We filed a written complaint against one of the stores manager here in UK. When asked about the complaint dept or if there is an independent authority to review the complaint handling - no answer. I send an email to customer service USA who asked me to fill in an enquiry form which i did but no response . She also said that she will pass this on to the corporate office but no response from there as well. There is a CCTV footage available to view alongside our written complaint . Does anyone know if they have a complaint dept or if we are not happy with complaint handling with clear bias than is there any regulatory or independent authority to review the complaint and the process please let me know . Thanks

Name: Lee Chouinard
ReviewText: Where do I start... First of all, I received an item smelling very strong like mildew. So I called immediately to talk to customer service taking into  account the one hour time difference and called well before that. Yet it kept saying that the call center was closed. I tried this repeatedly and left messages as well as sent emails. I was trying to request a return label and talk to someone about not being charged for the return label, as it was a damaged item. I never did receive a phone call back or a personal email. However, a mailing label was eventually issued with no real message. So I mailed the item back, and finally after 2 weeks I received my refund, but the charged me for the mailing label which is specifically why I had been trying to get a hold of someone. Why would I have to pay to send back a damaged item? The customer service is among the worst I have ever encountered and I order from many places. Completely unacceptable when most businesses are trying to retain customers.

Name: Hosh
ReviewText: Their designs and colors they use are great, but depending on where the shirts are made, in Bangladesh or India, the quality varies significantly.Whats a Large size shirt becomes a medium or small after one wash if it's made in Banlgadesh v/s india! Not sure why such a huge difference, but the shirts I bought that were made in Bangladesh shrunk at least 1 size down. A few shrunk up to 4 inches.Their return policy is if you wash the clothes as per instructions (cold water, tumble dry, etc), they still can NOT be returned if they shrink because their material has a defect.What's THE worst is their Customer Service Team!WOW!I spoke with Chelsea Lopez and Alexandra Lopez. Not sure if they are related due to their last name, but man their attitude via email was off the charts!My questions about a returns were met with hostility and rudeness, unempathetic, disconcerting attitude.I have spent over $1k buying stuff from them within the past 3 months alone. Being confronted by such a horrible attitude deters me from wanting to give them my business!

Name: Ronald Ajewole
ReviewText: This looks like a one-person business. But that’s fine. However, when you run an online business and expect it to grow, you need an effective and responsive customer service department. Unfortunately, this person runs everything single-handedly. You’re only able to reach customer service via email. And this person is only able to respond to your email when they can. So my issue is that I placed an order, and immediately realized I had placed the wrong order. Being the first time on the site, I tried to see if I could reach customer service on phone. I couldn’t find a phone number for them. No way I could cancel the order online, they hadn’t made any provision for that. The only available option was to email which I did requesting that my order be cancelled. I got no response. 3 days later, my order is shipped, after which I received an email that orders couldn’t be cancelled when they’ve been shipped. WHAT? So this is some sort of scam to get customers to forcefully accept orders they don’t want. No provision to cancel orders. Me and this person attending to their email (name is Chelsea) have been going back and forth on emails. The order was delivered at my front door. I’m insisting on a refund. She wants me to take the order to the post office. Well, hell no, I’m not going nowhere. The order shouldn’t have been shipped in the first place. Also, it was left at my front door. So have your shipper come pick it up where it was left. Also, I’m incapacitated, yet you want me to take it to a post office. It’s never happening. She won’t give me my refund. I’ve got nothing to do with the item shipped. It’s been sitting at my front door. I can’t speak to a superior because of course there isn’t one. I have decided to give her 2 business days to give me my refund after which I’ll take it up. My money isn’t much, but it isn’t about the money. It’s about trying to get me to accept an order I don’t want.

ReviewText: While the prices and product seem good, I was given Sunday, June 11th as my delivery date, but package didn’t arrive till June 14th, 3 days late.I paid for UPS SUREPOST: not cheap (directly to my home), yet it came via regular USPS MAIL, so there should be a refund, or say what you mean to do; don’t bait-and-switch as it’s bad faith business practice.Finally, package had the U.S. Polo Association.com logo displayed prominently on the bag, making it so so much easier to steal, especially nowadays. Also I selected the items from regular men’s —> clothing —> shirts section, not from clearance section. Why should they show up the final sale item in regular men’s section. But most importantly, they didn’t mention anywhere that this is the final sale item. So it’s completely unacceptable. They should accept the return. And the other worst part is, I responded to their email, I am getting the below error response from gmail since two days - “Recipient inbox fullYour message couldn't be delivered. Their inbox is full”How could such a big company which use corporate emails have such issues, and I am trying since two days, what they heck they are doing in the world without clearing this issue and I see this is the only way of communicating, There is phone call support option, but of no use, it always goes to voice mail.This is my first time ordering the clothes from US polo and it is one of the worst experience till date regards to clothes. ***Lot of flaws.If I get the chance, I will give zero rating

Name: PRAVEEN KUMAR
ReviewText: Here are the things that went wrong,1. If I buy Online, the items could not be returned at store, however store credit\replacement option is available for return which is very inconvenient.2. Multiple items bought in an order that involved a flat shipping cost. However, I never received all the items in the order (because some item was out of stock). Even though it is not customer fault that item is out of stock, but we were charged with the full shipping cost even for the partial order received. No updates received for the item that cannot be fulfilled. Even after 25 days, did not received any update on when it will be fulfilled. Finally, I have to call and cancel the order. While cancelling order I had to talk to supervisor to prorate the shipping cost because it was not my fault that all the items were not shipped.Unless emergency, I won't recommend buying online.

I sent the customer service a email asking why, and a customer service representative called Alexandra L say I need to pay for the return fee, that is why my money was partially refunded. And send me a screenshot showing I have to pay for the return shipping, which I didn't pay any attention to when printing the return shipping label, because I have read the return policy when I made the purchase. ReviewText: Their sizes are a off. Some jacket models are bigger than the other models. It is a lottery, you do not know if it fits you or not. I'm L regular but I have to buy both sizes L and XL, and see which one fits me. Then return the one that does not fit. But shipping and returns is not free. And even the size XL is a bit tight in underarms area which also makes sleeves shorter than needed. I have Tommy jacket that i grew out of a bit but still there is no tightness underarms.  Also, the sleeve openings on all USPA jackets are huge and very loose. Annoying to me personally. Like they made for Hulks or giants only. And there is no velcro or button to make this smaller.

ReviewText: Name is "U.S.". Products are all made in India/Pakistan.I made a huge order of many items to take them as gifts abroad. Some items got delivered, some items' status was "preparing to ship".After a few weeks, i emailed and after emailing twice i got a reply that those items are out of stock. Now i don't have enough time to go shopping again.I wrote back to the customer support, why were the items available to purchase if out of stock and... why wasn't i communicated before. I got reply putting the blame on me that i should have contacted them when only partial delivery was made. wow! the status said "preparing to ship". Not a slight sense of apologies, instead blaming me.Never buy with these people. I am guessing this is really not a US company. It's just a name.

The next day I got an email about missed call and offered an option to communicate through email, I explained my situation and requested about exchanging or returning the items, but even after multiple emails I didn’t receive any response. I decided to drive to the store, 40 miles away and the store manager told that the online store is separate from in store. ReviewText: I always like US polo garments but this time my experience is little different, I had ordered 6 polo t-shirts with all having M size, but 3 were made in India and 3 were made in Bangladesh. I asked US Polo, can I return these items to store ? they said no you have to return it to the online store and for that return they charged me shipping fee. If same size is not fitting me then its not my fault why I should pay the shipping charges for being not at fault that I didn't understand. Also I felt US polo website is not much user-friendly to initiate returns other options as well.

Name: whashburn
ReviewText: I selected FedEx Ground shipping because the estimated delivery time was reasonable and it was the lowest cost shipping U.S. Polo offers.  Unfortunately they do not offer USPS.  My package has been travelling around the east coast three days beyond the estimated delivery date. It has travelled north and south (VA, MD, LA) on its way to NJ. FedEx just explained that FedEx Ground policy it to keep their trucks full and the truck will move from one depot to another until there are enough packages in the truck for the truck eventually to drive to the destination depot.  The FedEx agent explained that a ground delivery could take longer than 10 days.This is a one star review because U.S. Polo does not offer USPS Priority which is less expensive and more reliable.

I ordered a product for next day delivery which didn’t turn up until 5 days after. When I contacted customer service about this the person on the other side was either a compulsive liar or an extremely incompetent employee. He argued with me about how even though the online tracking showed the product was not even dispatched, delivery was actually attempted and I wasn’t home to receive it.He went on to say a calling card was left. I have a doorbell camera and was home all day. None of the above was true I then returned the product which was a gift and pointless to me as the event had already passed.I returned the product as is without even opening it and just pasted the return label on it.This person from customer service gets in touch with me a few days later to say that I have actually returned a different item from a different brand and he will not be refunding my amount. He said you have put an M&S item and sent back to us! No matter how I explained  to him that I returned the package as I received it he wouldn’t understand. I have never experienced this with any other retailers and it was frustrating dealing with this brand and their customer service representative.

Name: MW
ReviewText: I ordered (order# 515392) a few items from your website which were clearance items, upon trying them they were one size bigger (XL) so I wanted to exchange them for a smaller size (L). So I placed another order (order # 520278) with you guys for the L size same items if they were still available and contacted your customer representative over email to help with the return of (order# 515392). Alexandra informed me that she couldn't provide me a return label as these were clearance items and final sale. Since this was the first time I bought from your website, there was no indication of "Final Sale" on the page displaying the item it self or the shopping basket that the item is final sale only. The only place I found that information was in the exchange and return section which was a little misleading for me as a new customer. Had I known that clearance items are final sale I would have not placed the order rather gone to the store. Since it was a genuine mistake as a first time buyer I asked Alexandra if she could do a one time courtesy return only given there were multiple items not just one. She mentioned no it wont be possible, which to be honest is a little disappointing for me and makes me not want to buy from your website again. Let me know if you are willing to accommodate any of my requests. As I now have two same items in XL and another in L size.

Name: Sean DAngelo
ReviewText: Sorry but I feel I must give a review and it’s not very positive. I purchased 6 white v-neck XL shirts. When I received them and took all of them out of their packages I noticed a “blue-ish” tint? I’m thinking that my eyes are just tired so I washed them in accordance to the instructions on the tags. I took them out of the washer and they still have that same blue tint? I washed them at least another 4 times and same result. Realizing that I am probably not going to send them back I trew dem back into the washer with a little bit of bleach on a warm cycle. I think this did the trick! Oh- they do shrink from the waist upwards so you taller people get ready for a half shirt. I don’t mind because I am a perfect height of 5’9” so they fit just fine.

Name: Soum
ReviewText: Pros: easy to shop and find what you looking for. I got good discount on my order. Cons: you won’t be able to change a size,color, design once the order placed, no matter how long after you placed your order. If you received a size that didn’t fit you, you can return the item, but you will be paying the return shipping fees.So my 3 starts is only for the cancellation and the change to the order after placing it. I ordered mine on Saturday and received the tracking number on Monday 8pm, so there was a plenty of time, but they couldn’t change or cancel that item I ordered accidentally a different size.POLO US should give customers at least few hours after the order placed to change size, color, or a design.

ReviewText: I order three items as Christmas presents for my parents. Approximately a week later I received a notification that one of the items was shipped. I figured that since it was a busy month that the other items were slightly delayed and would arrive at a later time. I waited until 1/3 expecting the other items to arrive, but decided that I had waited enough. I contacted the help center again, and they notified me that the items I ordered were out of stock and that they had canceled my order. I never received a notification regarding these changes.  I believe there should have been better communication on the part of US polo regarding the status of my items. Now I need to repurchase a present for my father and am hesitant to repurchase through online US polo.

I received an email asking for proof in a photo.  Upon seeing the photo proof, they said i can send the ripped polo back for refund.  However, as a Canadian buyer (there is no return label for us) I would have to pay for the postage.  For this I have to think hard for postage cost is big.

Name: Kendall Graysen-Thomson
ReviewText: I always enjoyed shopping at US Polo Assn. but recently had a problem with an order. It never arrived or was stolen & company did not stand behind it,  despite me jumping through hoops to inform police & check with every neighbour I have. So I'm out $100+ for gifts bought for my son's for Father's Day.Normally I would highly recommend, but now, I say, DO NOT order from them unless you have a secure spot to get your packages.I know there are so called "Porch Pirates" everywhere, even in nice neighbourhoods which is why I installed a camera. No one took into account not even the delivery driver showed up on my camera.Update: Someone was supposed to email me in hopes of resolving this issue, but apparently I am not worth the time or effort. I will try phoning & see if I can talk to someone. Many have told me this is a waste of time, but really? I mean surely a company of this size must have insurance or something, correct? I truly cannot be the ONLY person on the planet this has happened to.Update: I spoke to FedX personel twice & they both told me that US Polo Assn could & SHOULD file an insurance report & replace or refund my order but they won't do either!Update again: Finally, I received a refund! I still love the clothing, & normally with this exception I've had no issues with customer service or website. I gave 3 stars this time & may try ordering again, as my sons love clothing from there. Hopefully next order will go smoothly

When I asked about it, the customer service person responded that they received only 2 in a package. I think they might have mixed up some packages or messed up the refunds. They don’t even have a call center to call and resolve the issue. Very bad experience and I will not recommend purchasing online from US Polo. Name: mariela martinez
ReviewText: Horrible customer service. I have a upcoming trip overseas and was given the option of overnight shipping at time of purchase so I picked that option thinking I was going to receive my order on time. Well just minutes after placing the order they sent an email saying that due to circumstances beyond their control my order will be delayed past the original estimated delivery date. We apologize for the inconvenience. Since then I started calling this people, sent them emails and nothing. When ever I called I only got the answering machine. Mind you I been calling since yesterday and today from 9 am and on. I finally got a response from Alexandra Lopez at 11am and instead of canceling my order as I requested on emails and voicemails, she proceeded to send me information about the shipping. I told her I not longer need the order since I’m traveling and it won’t get to me on time before my trip. Well this lady decided to wait till almost 3pm in the afternoon to tell me my order already shipped and can not longer be canceled. I’m very upset since they don’t have an option to cancel order online and their customer service is a disgrace. There was plenty of time to cancel my order but no one listened. I Will never be buying from them online again.

As a result, after the first wash, the garment becomes shorter but wider.  For example, this applies to dresses and t-shirts. ReviewText: Bad service on my last order no 202195 of $586.70usd. After making order from canada and making payments for tax and duties of $203.03 to uspolo, fedex here in Canada was asking for tax&duties payments again. After I have already paid uspolo. This delayed delivery to my house after delivery vehicle came and refused to released the goods to me. Also there were many back and forth comes between uspolo, myself and fedex, yet no resolve after many days beyond delivery date. Its pure lack of communication to fedex from uspolo, had to go to fedex office for pickup . Also goods ordered weren't complete, the box was already opened , I have the picture..... additionally, the communication the the uspolo reps was so unpleasant, I was treated like trash after several multiple orders in the past.....am so disappointed.

ReviewText: The product quality is sufficient. The shipping out time is also quite long, about 10 business days just to ship out, which they attribute short staffing due to the COVID, but you got to give them that.

However my original shipping cost and new 7.50 label will be deducted and the price of the shirts at time of purchase will not be honored although I want the exact same shirts. I asked about exchanging the shirts at the store, which I was informed can not be done either. So in the future I will take my business elsewhere as the customer service/policy for an exchange is awful.

Name: Raquel
ReviewText: My review is based on the company, not the product. The product was fine. What I don't like is being ignored. I placed this order on June 2nd in hopes that it would arrive for Father's Day. Literally, 2 mins after placing the order I reached out because I need to make a change. Couldn't reach anyone and my email went unanswered. Once it got closer to Father's Day and my order still wasn't here, I called 3x and couldn't reach anyone. Sent two emails one week apart, still unanswered. My order being late is understandable because of the Pandemic but the fact that my attempts went completely unanswered is what did it for me. All I wanted to know is if it was going to be here or not so I could make other plans for a different gift. My order finally arrived 27 days after placing my order which again was fine. I will never place another order based on the lack of customer service alone! Literally 9 of the 10 shirts I ordered haven't even been opened. I really should return them and order elsewhere!

Name: Brandon Schultz
ReviewText: For starters, I am very conscious on how my pants fit, and these chinos fit wonderfully! They're a little tight in the seat and thighs, which I like; as a result, these chinos are one of the few pairs I have that are actually a skinny fit and not a super skinny or a slim fit. There is not too much excess fabric near the hems, nor is there too little. The only drawback is that the waist is a little wider than expected, it didn't hug my waist like my best-fitting pants do, but its not much of a difference. Definitely recommend these to anyone who is a smaller guy like me. I am a size 28x30.

After the customer service agent told me that all of the items were shipped at once, I disputed that fact, but I never heard from her until I informed her that I received my missing item.I seriously did not like the fact that you all didn’t even try and address my missing item, other than to tell me that it was all shipped in one package.Thanks,Carolyn Jones

ReviewText: All was easy,very adorable BUT WHEN SOME DRESS SHIRTS(ALL DRESS SHIRTS, IF YOU ARE LARGER GUY,RUN VERY MUCH SMALLER THAN A NORMAL XXL )!!! LADY WAS NOT HELPFUL AND WANTED TO DEDUCT RETURN SHIPPING FROM REFUND AMT. FOR EACH SHIRT.THEY PUNISH THE CUSTOMER FOR NOT FITTING INTO SHIRTS THAT ARE INCORRECTLY SIZED!! LAST THING...THEY NEED TO REMOVE ITEMS FROM WWW SITE IF SOLD OUT.YOU WAIST TIME PULLING UP ITEM AFTER ITEM===SOLD OUT.SHOES FIT PERFECT.I BMM BOUGHT 4 PAIRS SIZE 13...FIT PERFECTLY. THEY DO CUT CORNERS ON SHOE QUALITY.EXAMPLE,I PURCHASED BOOTS WITH STRAP,BUCKLE OVER TOP OF FOOT.IT WAS FAKE STUCK ON WITH VELCRO!!!SHIRTS ARE GREAT QUALITY AND SALE PRICES WERE FANTASTIC.THEY NEED TO IMPROVE RETURNS POLICY AND SYSTEM AND NOT CHARGE FOLKS FOR RETURNS AS DRESS CLOTHING=LONG SLEEVE SHIRTS,DRESS SS SHIRTS,ETC ARE WAY TOO SMALL AND NOT XXL AS MARKED.POLO SHIRTS WERE SIZED PERFECTLY AND THE XXL FIT GREAT WHILE DRESS SHIRTS WOULD NOT GO OVER MY HEAD.

Name: Alex Sarakbi
ReviewText: I’ve always loved US Polo brand and have been a loyal customer, but this was my first experience buying online.The website was easy to navigate (though it didn’t give me an expected delivery time to Canada), the product arrived fast, product quality was great, but a couple of weeks later I received an invoice from FedEx out of the blue for duties an fees which was about 70% of the value of the product!The worst part was when contacting the customer service team, the response I got was the most dry legal one pointing out how I did receive a warning during my purchase and how it was entirely my fault and I’m the only one to blame!Now, even if there was something hidden in the fine print that I missed, the answer was coming from more of a lawyer than customer service representative! It made my experience sound invalid and was all about blaming the customer for not doing their job and looking for all hidden terms of the purchase.Having said that, this will not stop me from buying again online in the future but I was definitely expecting higher standards from customer service team.

Name: Broke
ReviewText: I ordered 2 of the same polo shirts in 2 separate orders. The reason I placed 2 orders for the same shirt is that the first shirt came with the security device left on it.  Since U.S. Polo Assn., does not offer returns just refunds, I ordered a second shirt to replace the first while I processed my return.  While my second shirt was in transit, I heard from customer service that I could return the shirt but they could not guarantee a refund because U.S. Polo Assn., doesn't put security devices on their clothes. (So I guess I put the security device on the shirt?) Of course, I refused to return the shirt since I was not promised a refund.  A few days later, the replacement shirt arrived and guess what?  You guessed it, it too had a security device on it! Go figure.  So I have two Polo shirts with security devices that I will not return because there is no guarantee that I will get a refund.  Maybe this will be my new fashon statement, "Polo Shirts with security devices"
